@UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.journals.JournalEntry.mdn9FMsCRMWyyl8M.JournalEntryPage.HqbW6hYYFKzM74Sg#nebula-facet]{Nebula Facet}confer mysticism, and it reflects a Dreamerâ€™s connection to the universe. Nebula facets grant a unique innate spell. These spells are incarnate spells, and you can cast only one nebula facet granted spell once per day, even if you engrave to another nebula facet.

Accessing higher levelled Asterisms on Nebula Facets allow you to cast the granted spell additional times per day, but this benefit is shared among all other nebula facet spells of that asterism. For example, if you have two nebula facets engraved and both have their second asterisms available, you can only cast the spell granted by one of the two facets a second time.

@UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.journals.JournalEntry.mdn9FMsCRMWyyl8M]{Facets of Creation} are the fragments of creation that persist in the world, encased in crystalline form found in pieces scattered across Alamein. While many only can enjoy them as interesting, beautiful pieces of jewelry, it harbors a powerful memory or idea locked within.

Those with a talent or gift to unlock it can bring forth its miracles into reality, despite being an idea themselves.
